Malangatana: Mozambique Modern

This publication shares and expands upon Malangatana: Mozambique Modern, an exhibition dedicated to the work of the pioneering artist Malangatana Ngwenya (1936–2011) with a focus on his oeuvre from the late 1950s until 1975, the year of Mozambique’s independence.

“Affinities: Malangatana, Surrealism, and Black Liberatory Politics” by Felicia Mings
